fields.label: Details
fields.name: publication_description
fields.instructions:
Add any relevant details about this publication, such as journal name, volume, page numbers etc. Format text by selecting it and clicking the 'b' button for bold or the 'i' for italic. To add a description or abstract, use the text editor field below the Files block.

eg: David Reubi, 2018, Economy & Society, 47, 1, 83-110 | Part of Special Issue on Facts, Power and the Politics of Global Evidence edited by Ann Kelly & Linsey McGoey.
